name: IQ AXIOM
description:
Gone are the days when you solve mazes with pen and paper. It is time to immerse yourself in a REAL MAZE. 

Race in a labyrinth of obstacles! Unique skills are at your disposal! Race against your friends, find the cheese, and beat your record!!! What is your IQ? Play to find out!

Note: This game is currently in Beta Testing, please give feedback!

In Development: pause/exit menu, multiplayer network, BGM license 

Objective:

Collect 3 Keystones to unlock the Gate and get the CHEESE!!

Abilities:

LMB - Fart (Dash)

RMB - Teleport to Pee

E - Poop (Tracker Placement)

Q - Pee (Set Teleport Location)

SPACE - Jump

WASD - Movement

Background:

In the future where IQ evaluations are standardized through a series of virtual trials, one challenge stands out to be weighted the most: Matrix Recall.

Many opportunities open up for people who score well in the IQ Standardized Trials(IQST), leading to the development of the game: IQ Axiom.

IQ Axiom simulates the challenges of Matrix Recall with near perfection, making it the go-to training ground for annual IQST examinations.

The rising popularity of the game made it a global esport that is welcomed in schools and corporations as IQ Axiom became a status of your intelligence.

Compact virtual gadgets are now at your disposal to challenge anyone to an intellectual showdown at any time, so what are you waiting for?
